content.text: Hey what's up? I'm going to take my dog hiking later.
That sounds fun! I love hiking. I do it pretty much every weekend.
Nice! Where do you like to hike?
I usually go to a local park or trail. I'm not too adventurous yet.
That's okay, I just started hiking last year. I've been doing a lot of research on different trails and I've found a few that I'm excited to try.
Oh cool, I'm always looking for new places to hike.
I just moved to the US from Australia a few months ago.
Oh wow, that's a big change! How do you like it so far?
It's been great! I'm loving the weather and the food.
That's awesome! I'm glad you're enjoying it here.
